title: What's next for Android smartwatches: the clock is ticking
description: Wear OS is in a much better place that it was six months ago. In the new 2.1 update, Google changed the main watch face and everything is simpler and easier to use. Pair that with news of Qualcomms Snapdragon 3100 processor and smartwatches for Android users start looking a lot less grim. In this weeks Processor, Dieter revisits what's next for Wear OS smartwatches.
